name: Don't Do It (FelineFriendly)
description:
**PLAY IN FULLSCREEN AND READ CONTROLS BELOW**

Take part in an experiment run by your friendly neighborhood P.H.I.L. in which you must complete simple challenges. Immerse yourself in this relaxing game, and just remember: Don't Do It!

CONTROLS: 

  • MOVE/JUMP - WASD or Arrow Keys
  • RUN - hold Left Shift while moving
  • CONTINUE DIALOGUE - Space Bar/Enter
  • RESTART LEVEL - R
  • PAUSE - P

CREDITS:

FelineFriendly, LabRat54, and DefineDoddy - Programming

RustyDavis - Art
